subject: Re: [junit] JUnit tests for Java collections
from: "B. Sai Prasad, M.Phil, SCJP, MCP, MCTS, SSGB, PMP, PMI-SP" <sai.prasad.b@...>
authorName: B. Sai Prasad, M.Phil, SCJP, MCP, MCTS, S
msgSnippet: Hi - You can use hamcrest asserts in JUnit 4.x to test your collections. Please visit http://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/wiki/Tutorial,
messageBody:
Hi -

You can use hamcrest asserts in JUnit 4.x to test your collections.

Please visit http://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/wiki/Tutorial,
http://www.jmock.org/javadoc/2.5.1/ for its usage.

Regards
Sai

On 10/25/09, ilangocal <ilangocal@...> wrote:
>
>
>
> I am interested in knowing if somebody has already written Junit unit tests
> for Java Collection Classes.
> Thanks in advance.
>
